channel.title: Client closes for others
channel.description: So i grabbed the uncalled attack source, and i wanted to show my friend some changes i made. Every time he try's to open the client the CMD window will come up, but it will just close. I've tried it on my laptop as well it does the same thing.. Any ideas?

item.title: Client closes for others
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Do they have windows 7? And is this a PI?

Here is the code I have for my windows 7 run.bat.

@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\JAVA TYPE\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

Just input your java type.

EX: “jdk1.6.0_21”
“jdk1.7.0”
etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Client closes for others
item.dc:creator: @Medi Medi
item.description:
@Medi wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:2, topic:419272”]“pause”

I mean, put “pause” at the end of the batch file.[/quote]
I’ve tried that… It just brings up a message saying. Press any key to continue…

Read full topic

item.title: Client closes for others

item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

“pause”

I mean, put “pause” at the end of the batch file.
